channel.title: Allstarscape v2
channel.description:
hey, every time i click on run.bat, the allstarscape v2 server starts running, but every time i try to log in it sais your account is already logged in and this error comes up:
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 56373. Client type: low memory version UserId: 26901767 lol is signing onto server. lol: character file not found. lol: moreinfo file not found. lol: error writing file. LOADED: 3 java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\lol.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.appendConnected(client.java:10613) at client.run(client.java:10856) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) lol: moreinfo file not found. lol: error writing file. Could not save for _ ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.
help me pls i have no idea what to do

item.title: Allstarscape v2
item.dc:creator: @allstarscape1 allstarscape1
item.description:
@allstarscape1 wrote:

hey, every time i click on run.bat, the allstarscape v2 server starts running, but every time i try to log in it sais your account is already logged in and this error comes up:

Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 56373.
Client type: low memory version
UserId: 26901767
lol is signing onto server.
lol: character file not found.
lol: moreinfo file not found.
lol: error writing file.
LOADED: 3
java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\lol.txt (The system cannot find the
path specified)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileWriter.(Unknown Source)
at client.appendConnected(client.java:10613)
at client.run(client.java:10856)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
lol: moreinfo file not found.
lol: error writing file.
Could not save for _
ClientHandler: Client _ disconnected.

help me pls i have no idea what to do
